scripts.build: rm -rf server/dist && npm --workspace client run build -- --mode ${npm_config_mode} --emptyOutDir --outDir ../server/dist
scripts.postdeploy: git add **/package.json package-lock.json && npm version $npm_config_level --include-workspace-root --force && git push origin main --tags && git switch staging && git merge origin main && git push
scripts.predeploy: git switch main && git pull origin main --rebase --tags && git merge origin staging
scripts.preview: npm run build --mode=${npm_config_mode} && npm --workspace server start
